οἱ πλούσιοι καταδυναστεύουσιν {apa-Bw] In the supposed case the sole ground of preference between the two strangers was that the one seemed rich, the other poor 3 but you have certainly no reason for favouring the rich as a class. The verb only occurs elsewhere in Acts X, 38 καταδυναστευομένους ὑπὸ τοῦ διαβόλου, in N.T. but we find the similar forms κατακυριεύειν and κατεξουσιάζειν Matt. XX. 25.
